caption.center: BELINDA LEE BRASSEUR, Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District.

opinion.posture: Appeal pursuant to Fla.R.App.P. 9.141(b)(2) from the Circuit Court for Sarasota County; Becky A. Titus, Judge.
opinion.opinion_text:
Affirmed. See Toomer v. State, 895 So. 2d 1256 (Fla. 1st DCA 2005).
WHATLEY, NORTHCUTT, and WALLACE, JJ., Concur.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE REHEARING MOTION AND, IF FILED, DETERMINED.
